experience.title: Full Stack Engineer
experience.description: Currency is a FinTech company specializing in transaction enablement. Currency streamlines transactions between buyers and sellers through innovative technology to facilitate the ‘buy, sell, and borrow’ process
descriptionItems: Contribute to the development, maintenance and deployment of front-end and back-end applications, using Mongo DB, React, Node, Microsoft Azure, AWS, Docker, Angular, C# and Feature Flags
Participate in agile development of project timelines, implementation design specifications, system flow diagrams
Completed key strategic integrations to with third party partners for application processing

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
experience.description: RGR Marketing in a lead generation company focusing on solar, refinance and tax settlement leads.
descriptionItems: Contributed to product development, product enhancement and bug fixing of the front-end and back-end using the  Linux, Apache, MySQL, and PHP Stack, React, AWS and Rackspace.
Built, maintained and deployed the front-end of new sites to collect leads (Solar, Refinance, Tax)
Wrote complex SQL scripts to provide clients and team members with customized reports
Created Database backup process through AWS S3
Experienced in integrating of client APIs with the RGR platform

experience.title: Solutions Specialist
experience.description: LRW is world class market research company that applies advanced modeling and analytic techniques to a wealth of data streams, with a consultative approach to provide unparalleled impact for clients.
descriptionItems: Built, deployed and maintained 6 customer experience survey programs that collect and report data to drive business decisions for Fortune 500 Companies
Created customized email and SMS targeted web-based surveys using HTML, CSS and JavaScript
Created a JavaScript tool to dynamically clean out profanity in comments before displaying in reporting
Identified operational issues with online purchases and provided metrics to drive changes in the online retail process

Increased volume of customer reviews on a retailers’ web page 40% by integrating customer experience surveys with the Bazaarvoice platform and directly driving traffic to the platform through an opt in process to leave an additional product/service review

about.aboutMe: I am a Full Stack Engineer that enjoys great coffee and all forms of sci-fi (books, movies, comics). My strengths include being team player, excellent communication skills, and flexibility to handle change. Some of the projects I have worked on in my spare time are highlighted below.

projectSnapshots.name: Snappy
projectSnapshots.info: A web app that creates targeted email surveys with an authenticated account and credit based campaigns.

projectSnapshots.name: Fruitdrop
projectSnapshots.info: A site for communities to share home grown fruits and vegetables in order to prevent food waste.

projectSnapshots.name: Bob's Banana Budget
projectSnapshots.info: A complete Full-Stack Node application with a React Front End and unit tests for the REST API backend. Showcases a handy calculator to solve Bob's Banana Budget problem.

projectSnapshots.name: Chatterbox
projectSnapshots.info: A chat application implemented with web-sockets

projectSnapshots.name: Trivia Game
projectSnapshots.info: A time based trivia game that focuses on content from Pixar movies.

projectSnapshots.name: Hangman
projectSnapshots.info: Here is my spin on Hangman. I have chosen a space theme for my version.

projects.name: Snappy
projects.info: A web app that creates targeted email surveys. Quick and simple interface allows you to create and send surveys to any list people/customers. Sign up today and send out your first survey in under 10 minutes.

projects.name: Fruitdrop
projects.info: Fruit Drop is a community for home growers who want to share and trade their fruit and produce. This allows everyone in your neighborhoods to benefit from one another and get fresh, organic produce.

projects.name: Bob's Banana Budget
projects.info: A complete Full-Stack Node application with a React Front End and unit tests for the REST API backend. The main purpose of this application is to create a calculator that solves Bob's Budget dilemma as stated in the application.

projects.name: Chatterbox
projects.info: A chat application implemented with web-sockets

projects.name: Trivia Game
projects.info: A time based trivia game that focuses on content from Pixar movies. Put your knowledge of Pixar trivia to the test and you might learn a couple of new facts. There are 20 randomized questions, each timed for 10 seconds.

projects.name: Hangman
projects.info: Here is my spin on Hangman. I have chosen a space theme for my version. Test your hangman skills and knowledge of astronomy terms. There are a total of 10 randomized words.
